description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow changes on materials, in relation to planning permission reference 231019FUL dated 29/09/2023 for 'Change of use of a single dwelling house (Use Class C3) into a large House into Multiple Occupation (HMO) comprising 8 bedrooms (Use Class Sui Generis); single storey and part two storey rear extension (following demolition of existing extensions); alteration of main roof profile from hip to gable end; two storey side extension; associated internal and external alterations; provision of amenity space, cycle and refuse storage and off street parking.'
decision_conditions: The proposed amendments cannot be accepted as non-material amendments to planning permission 231019FUL dated 29/09/2023 in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for non-material amendments following grant of planning permission 2011.
